Vishal possesses two of the most important qualities required of a developer: observation and a strong desire to learn new things. He does not do it as a hobby, but he strives for perfection. He is always willing to accept a difficult task as a challenge, but most importantly, he completes it without fail, which makes him a dependable team member in any situation. Needless to say he is an asset to any team and his dedication will surely take him to places professionally.
